pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, April 19, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, April 19, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, Xavier Bettel.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Center Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open photo opportunity
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca
